ERRORS.GENERIC: There was an error. Please try again later.
ERRORS.ROOM_NOT_FOUND_MAYBE_DISBANDED: Room not found. Maybe it was disbanded.
ERRORS.DAILY_ROOMS_LIMIT: You can create up to {{DAILY_ROOMS_LIMIT}} rooms per day. Try again tomorrow.

HOME.META_DESCRIPTION: Draw in real time with your friends or random people in an online Pictochat version

SEARCH_ROOMS_SCREEN.META_DESCRIPTION: Find online rooms to chat and draw in real time in an online Pictochat spiritual successor.
SEARCH_ROOMS_SCREEN.SECTION_TITLE: Choose a Chat Room to join

CREATE_ROOM_SCREEN.META_DESCRIPTION: Create your own room to chat and draw in real time in an online Pictochat spiritual successor.
CREATE_ROOM_SCREEN.SECTION_TITLE: What room type do you want to create?

PUBLIC.TITLE: Public
PUBLIC.DESCRIPTION: Your room will be listed and anyone can join.

PRIVATE.TITLE: Private
PRIVATE.DESCRIPTION: Hidden room. Users join with an invitation code.

OFFLINE.TITLE: Offline
OFFLINE.DESCRIPTION: Draw and have fun with no connection.

JOIN_WITH_CODE_SCREEN.META_DESCRIPTION: Join a private room with a code to chat and draw online in a Pictochat online spiritual successor
JOIN_WITH_CODE_SCREEN.SECTION_TITLE: Join a private room with an invitation code

ROOM.GET_PUBLIC_ROOM_LINK_DIALOG: Get and share your room link, anyone can join :)
ROOM.GET_PRIVATE_ROOM_CODE_DIALOG: Share your code with others to let them join your room!
ROOM.PLEASE_SUPPORT_CANVAS: Please use a browser that supports the canvas element

ERRORS.NOT_FOUND_MISSING_CODE: Room not found: private code missing in URL.
ERRORS.DISBANDED_DUE_TO_INACTIVITY: Your room was disbanded due to inactivity.
ERRORS.ROOM_IS_FULL: Sorry, but the room is full.
ERRORS.SIMULTANEOUS_ROOMS_LIMIT: You can be in up to {{SIMULTANEOUS_ROOMS_LIMIT}} rooms at the same time.
ERRORS.BACK_ONLINE_DISBANDED: Back online. Your room was disbanded since it was empty.
